CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BR404

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: EBGU - Metroudvidelsesprojekt i Kharkiv
EBWE - Projekt zum Ausbau der Metro in Kharkiv
EBRD - Kharkiv Metro Extension Project
BERD - Proyecto de ampliación del metro de Kharkiv
EBRD - Harkovan metron laajennushanke
BERD - Projet relatif à l'extension du métro de Kharkiv
ΕΤΑΑ - Σχέδιο επέκτασης του μετρό στo Kharkiv
BERS - Progetto di estensione della metropolitana di Kharkiv
EBWO - Project voor uitbreiding van de metro in Kharkiv
BERD - Projeto relativo à ampliação do metro de Kharkiv
EBRD - Projekt för utvidgning av tunnelbanan i Charkiv
EBOR - Projekt týkající se rozšíření metra v lokalitě Kharkiv
EBRD - Kharkivi metroo laiendamise projekt
EBRD - A kharkivi metróbővítési projekt
ERPB - Charkovo metro plėtros projektas
ERAB - Harkovas metro paplašināšanas projekts
BERŻ - Proġett tal-Estensjoni tal-Metrò f’Kharkiv
EBOR - Projekt dotyczący rozbudowy metra w Charkowie
EBOR - Projekt rozšírenia metra v Charkove
EBOR - Projekt razširitve podzemne železnice v Harkovu
EBRD - Tionscadal Sínte Meitreo Kharkiv
ЕБВР - Проект за разширяване на метрото в Харков
BERD - Proiect privind extinderea metroului din Kharkiv
EBRD - Projekt proširenja podzemne željeznice u Kharkivu

TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Metroudvidelsesprojekt i Kharkiv (UA-Kharvik)

CONTENTS.P: Project name: Kharkiv Metro Extension Project
Country: Ukraine
Business sector: Municipal and Environmental Infrastructure
Project ID: 8978-GPN-46411(NM) Update
Funding source: EBRD, EIB
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General procurement notice
Issue date: 9.2.2018
Closing date: 9.2.2019 23:59PM
This is an update of the original notice. Please note updated contact details.

The Government of Ukraine has applied for loan financing from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) and European Investment Bank (EIB) for a project to extend a metro (subway) line in the city of Kharkiv. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of approximately 382 000 000 EUR equivalent will be implemented by Communal Enterprise “Kharkivsky Metropoliten” (Kharkiv Metro Company) and will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services (contracts):
— Extension of the existing metro line by 3,5 km and construction of 2 metro stations,
— Construction of new metro wagon depot and connecting rail,
— Acquisition of new rolling stock,
— FIDIC Engineer and procurement and implementation support consultant.
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the Q4 of 2017.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of loans from the EBRD and EIB will be subject to the EBRD Procurement Policies and Rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the EBRD and EIB loans will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ATTENTION: Mr. Igor Pashnev, Deputy General Director, Secretary of the Project Implementation Unit (PIU)

TI_DOC.P: EBWE - Projekt zum Ausbau der Metro in Kharkiv (UA-Kharvik)

— FIDIC Engineer and procurement and implementation support consultant.
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the Q4 of 2017.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of loans from the EBRD and EIB will be subject to the EBRD Procurement Policies and Rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the EBRD and EIB loans will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
